title: Pea and Pesto Potato Noodles
ingredients: To make homemade pesto: 2 tbsp pine nuts. 2 cups basil (packed). 2 tbsp parmesan. 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil. 2 cloves garlic.
directions: Peel potatoes, then spiralize into noodle shapes (using D blade). Cook in a large skillet over medium high heat for 7-10 minutes with olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste. Keep covered while cooking, uncovering only to toss occasionally p/ cook peas according to package directions.  p/ If making homemade pesto- place all pesto ingredients into a food processor and pulse until creamy. Taste, and adjust to preferences. p/ Combine potato noodles, peas, and pesto in a bowl and toss thoroughly to combine. Serve immediately or place in refrigerator to serve chilled. /p Serving size: 1/4 of total yield /p Calories 259/serving
